honors_and_awards.title: Mr. DPS
honors_and_awards.description: Was selected as Mr. DPS on farewell from school. Criteria were on basis of appearance, Walk, Q&A.

honors_and_awards.title: Best All Rounder
honors_and_awards.description: This award was given to him on the basis of his active participation in every field of co-curricular activities. He loved to be on stage. He participated in quizzes, debates, singing competitions, dancing competitions, plays, sports, etc. Literally anything which was conducted in school, he was a participant in that event. He earned various awards and recognition in school time due to his dedication towards versatility and competitiveness.

honors_and_awards.title: Head Boy
honors_and_awards.description: During 11th, he was selected as Head Boy of school. Leaded a team of 4 House Captains and 36 Prefects.
